duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee daily store operations, supervise employees, and manage inventory.
Develop successful sales plans to grow profitability and ensure sufficient staffing levels to meet the needs of guests.
Recruit, train, develop, and motivate employees, and promote a teamwork-oriented environment.
Implement new product lines and create strategies to introduce and promote them to guests.
Maintain safety and security of the store, ensure compliance with all local, state, and federal laws.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma/GED with minimum 2 years applicable experience; 2 years college; military experience.
